dialogues.speaker: Captain
dialogues.text: Raise the sails, we are leaving port.

dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: As the ship begins to glide through the calm seas, the crew busies themselves with their duties.

dialogues.speaker: Cabin Boy
dialogues.text: What shall I do, Mr. First Mate?

dialogues.speaker: First Mate
dialogues.text: Prepare the cannons, lad! You never know what awaits us on the high seas.
